interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: allez outdoor | Biodegradable Cleansing Cloths | Natural Plant-Based Face and Body Wipes | PH Balanced | Cactus Bloom and Chaparral Scent | 20ct Individually Wrapped Towelettes
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: Allez
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Allez', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 5.4 x 4.2 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ABWPS001', 'UPC': '860000823210', 'Manufacturer': 'Allez Outdoor, LLC'}
Review Text: These wipes are pretty good (albeit expensive).  I like that they are larger (10”x15”) and individually wrapped, which makes carrying them with you easier.  These would be great to take along on a hiking or camping trip, or any time you might want to wipe down your whole body.  I do NOT understand why the ad, pictures, description or box doesn’t include the size of the item - I find that oddly curious.  They have an interesting scent that I suspect some people may not like.  It is the chaparral scent which can smell a little ‘chemically’.  It isn’t bad but it *is* a somewhat unusual scent. After wiping down the scent does linger for a while, albeit somewhat lighter.  The wipes seem to have a lot of wiping power... it seemed that the moisture just remained as I wiped down most of my body.  They don’t feel any more moist than other wipes do, but it seems that the moisture goes a longer way.  Overall a very good product that is a little pricey, but does offer a nice convenience factor.
Review Title: 10” by 15” - larger size wipes
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Prefers high-quality, convenient personal care products, particularly biodegradable options. 
- **Size & Packaging:** Values larger sizes and individually wrapped items for portability, indicating a preference for practicality during outdoor activities.
- **Usage Context:** Likely enjoys outdoor activities such as hiking and camping, as evidenced by the interest in products suitable for these environments.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Open to unusual scents but acknowledges varying preferences; may lean towards natural or plant-based fragrances despite some reservations about synthetic smells.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Willing to pay a premium for perceived quality and convenience but has some scrutiny regarding product descriptions and marketing transparency.
- **Moisture Efficiency:** Appreciates products that provide lasting moisture and effective cleaning capabilities. 

Overall, this user favors eco-friendly, effective, and practical products that enhance outdoor experiences while being conscious of pricing and product transparency.
